explains: n. 大块，大片；厚块；（俚语）强壮

sentences.en: This enormous hunk of steel will soon be at the centre of a gas turbine big enough to meet the electricity needs of a small city.
sentences.cn: 这个巨大钢件在不久之后将被置于一个大型燃汽涡轮机的中心，该涡轮机发电量足可以满足一个小城市的需要。

sentences.en: First a hunk of metal; then a robot.
sentences.cn: 先有一大块金属；然后一个机器人。
